sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const hotels = [ { city: 'Paris, France', images: ['/images/paris.jpg', '/images/paris2.jpg', '/images/paris3.jpg'], description: 'Experience the romantic charm of Paris with luxury accommodations and breathtaking views of the Eiffel Tower.', amenities: ['Free Wi-Fi', '24/7 Concierge Service', 'Indoor Pool', 'Fitness Center'], priceRange: 'From $150 per night', rating: 4.5, roomTypes: ['Standard Room', 'Luxury Suite', 'Penthouse Suite'], availableRooms: 5, }, { city: 'Budapest, Hungary', images: ['/images/budapest.jpg', '/images/budapest2.jpg', '/images/budapest3.jpg'], description: 'Discover the beauty of Budapest, where historic architecture meets modern amenities in the heart of Europe.', amenities: ['Spa Services', 'City Tours', 'Free Breakfast', 'Outdoor Pool'], priceRange: 'From $120 per night', rating: 4.7, roomTypes: ['Deluxe Room', 'Family Suite'], availableRooms: 3, }, { city: 'New York, USA', images: ['/images/newyork.jpg', '/images/newyork2.jpg', '/images/newyork3.jpg'], description: 'Stay in the vibrant city of New York, offering a wide range of attractions from Broadway to Central Park.', amenities: ['Fitness Center', 'Room Service', 'Complimentary Shuttle', 'Pet-Friendly'], priceRange: 'From $200 per night', rating: 4.8, roomTypes: ['City View Room', 'Premium Suite', 'Skyline Suite'], availableRooms: 8, }, { city: 'Rome, Italy', images: ['/images/rome.jpg', '/images/rome2.jpg', '/images/rome3.jpg'], description: 'Immerse yourself in the ancient wonders of Rome, with easy access to the Colosseum and the Vatican.', amenities: ['Historical Tours', 'On-site Dining', 'Luxury Spa', 'Free Breakfast'], priceRange: 'From $180 per night', rating: 4.6, roomTypes: ['Classic Room', 'Junior Suite', 'Executive Suite'], availableRooms: 4, }, { city: 'Berlin, Germany', images: ['/images/berlin.jpg', '/images/berlin2.jpg', '/images/berlin3.jpg'], description: 'Explore Berlin, a hub for modern art, history, and culture, all while enjoying world-class accommodations.', amenities: ['Art Galleries', 'Pet-Friendly', 'Complimentary Parking', 'City Bike Rentals'], priceRange: 'From $130 per night', rating: 4.4, roomTypes: ['Standard Room', 'Art Suite', 'Penthouse Loft'], availableRooms: 6, }, { city: 'Stockholm, Sweden', images: ['/images/stockholm.jpg', '/images/stockholm2.jpg', '/images/stockholm3.jpg'], description: 'Enjoy the elegance of Stockholm, with its scenic waterfronts, stylish hotels, and rich Scandinavian history.', amenities: ['Free Breakfast', 'Luxury Lounge', 'Airport Shuttle', 'Sauna'], priceRange: 'From $140 per night', rating: 4.3, roomTypes: ['Standard Room', 'Royal Suite', 'Studio'], availableRooms: 7, }, ]; const Hotels = () => { return (

Explore Our Luxury Hotels

{hotels.map((hotel, index) => (
{/* Carousel of hotel images */}
{hotel.images.map((image, idx) => ( ))}

{hotel.city}

{hotel.description}

    {hotel.amenities.map((amenity, index) => (
  • {amenity}
    • ))}
{hotel.priceRange} {`★ ${hotel.rating}`}

Room Types:

    {hotel.roomTypes.map((room, index) => (
  • {room}
    • ))}
{`${hotel.availableRooms} Rooms Available`}
))}
); }; export default Hotels;
